grant_type.description: The grant type used in the initial request.

refresh_token.description: The refresh token used to obtain a new access token.

scope.description: The scope of the access request.

code.description: The authorization code received from the authorization server.

redirect_uri.description: The redirect URI used in the initial request.

code_verifier.description: The code verifier used in the initial request.

client_id.description: The client ID used in the initial request. May also be included in the Basic header.

client_secret.description: The client Secret used in the initial request. May also be included in the Basic header.
